Features

We have a customer satisfaction rate of a 100%! Not to mention, each drone comes with a 3 year warranty meaning if the drone gets damaged, we will replace it free of charge!


Our cypher vision is world renowned, being able to take photos and videos from altitudes of up to 1000ft in any weather thanks to our anti-glare/fog camera. You can take your pics at anytime.


Our cypher sense is one of the strongest wireless systems in the wolrd! Using the latest wireless connections technology, you and your cypher drone can be up to 5 miles apart and mantain a smooth connection.
